column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Wu says : " I mean , to need distance from women .
#Text=And we did it as friends .
#Text=Korra showed me the importance of putting others before myself and whenever I think of her , she continues to inspire me .
#Text=" Wu says : " Wow !
#Text=That story is amazing and I really learned something !
#Text=" Mako says : " You did ?
#Text=Good .
#Text=" Wu says : " Yeah !
#Text=I learned that I really did n't know anything about you !
#Text=Crazy !
#Text=Also , I realized that ladies are complicated .
#Text=No offense , Grandma .
#Text=" Yin says : " None taken .
#Text=" Wu says : " I better just focus on being a better king .
#Text=Okay , come at me .
#Text=I can take it .
#Text=" Wu says : " Aahhhhh !
#Text=Wu down !
#Text=" Asami says : " I brought you some tea .
#Text=I thought you might be cold out here .
#Text=" Korra says : " You 're so sweet .
#Text=Thanks .
#Text=" Asami says : " Are you okay ?
#Text=You seem out of sorts .
#Text=" Korra says : " Sorry .
#Text=I 've just been thinking about something Toph said .
#Text=She told me that the world does n't need me and it 's basically pointless to try and stop Kuvira .
#Text=" Asami says : " That 's ridiculous .
#Text=" Korra says : " At the time , I thought so , too .
#Text=I figured she was just being her normal , cranky self .
#Text=But I 'm beginning to think she had a point .
#Text=" Asami says : " No , she does n't .
#Text=The world does need you .
#Text=You 're the Avatar .
#Text=" Korra says : " But no matter what I do , the world seems to always be out of balance !
#Text=Growing up , I could n't wait to be the Avatar .
#Text=I thought I was really gon na change things .
#Text=I was so naive .
#Text=The first time I saw Amon take someone 's bending away , I was terrified .
#Text=" Amon says : " Your firebending is gone !
#Text=Forever .
#Text=" Korra says : " Then my worst nightmare came true .
#Text=" Mako says : " Korra !
#Text=" Korra says : " No !
#Text=" Amon says : " I told you I would destroy you .
#Text=" Asami says : " Korra , you 're forgetting about all the good that happened after you exposed Amon as the fraud he was .
#Text=The Equalist Movement lost its leader and its power .
#Text=Free elections were held in the United Republic and nonbenders finally had a voice .
#Text=People had hope again and it was all because of you .
#Text=" Korra says : " And I was hopeful , too .
#Text=That feeling did n't last long .
#Text=As soon as I defeated Amon , a new enemy took his place .
#Text=I ca n't believe I trusted you .
#Text=You made me think you wanted to restore balance with the spirits , but this , this is n't balance , it 's madness !
#Text=Now let her go !
#Text=" Unalaq says : " If you want your friend to make it out of the Spirit World , you 'll open the other portal now .
#Text=" Korra says : " Because of Unalaq , I betrayed Tenzin , opened the portals , and threw the Spirit and human worlds into chaos .
#Text=It was my fault he fused with Vaatu and became a Dark Avatar .
#Text=And I was helpless to stop him from destroying Raava and cutting off my connection to my past lives .
#Text=With Raava gone , Unalaq and Vaatu became more powerful than ever .
#Text=" Asami says : " But you became more powerful , too .
#Text=I mean ... you turned into a giant spirit .
#Text=" Korra says : " Yeah ... that was pretty awesome .
#Text=" Asami says : " And opening the spirit portals turned out to be a good thing .
#Text=You brought back the airbenders and caused a positive shift in the world .
#Text=" Korra says : " Yes , but Zaheer got airbending too and nearly killed me .
#Text=If it were n't for Zaheer , the Earth Queen would still be alive .
#Text=There would have been no crisis in the Earth Kingdom and Kuvira would n't be in power .
#Text=Things are more out of balance than ever now .
#Text=Nothing 's changed !
#Text="
